name: Case
description: Represents a customer issue or problem.
summary:
The **Case** object in Salesforce is designed to manage customer support and service inquiries. It includes a variety of attributes that help in tracking and resolving issues efficiently. Here's a summary of the attributes:

1. **Id**: Unique identifier for the case.
2. **IsDeleted**: Indicates if the case has been deleted.
3. **MasterRecordId**: Reference to the master case record in data consolidation.
4. **CaseNumber**: Auto-generated case number.
5. **ContactId**: Reference to the contact associated with the case.
6. **AccountId**: Reference to the account associated with the case.
7. **AssetId**: Reference to the asset related to the case.
8. **SourceId**: Reference to the source of the case.
9. **ParentId**: Reference to the parent case in case of hierarchical cases.
10. **SuppliedName**: Name supplied by the customer.
11. **SuppliedEmail**: Email supplied by the customer.
12. **SuppliedPhone**: Phone number supplied by the customer.
13. **SuppliedCompany**: Company name supplied by the customer.
14. **Type**: Type of case (picklist).
15. **Status**: Current status of the case (picklist).
16. **Reason**: Reason for the case (picklist).
17. **Origin**: Source of the case (picklist).
18. **Subject**: Subject of the case.
19. **Priority**: Priority level of the case (picklist).
20. **Description**: Detailed description of the case.
21. **IsClosed**: Indicates if the case is closed.
22. **ClosedDate**: Date and time when the case was closed.
23. **IsEscalated**: Indicates if the case has been escalated.
24. **OwnerId**: Reference to the user or queue that owns the case.
25. **CreatedDate**: Date and time when the case was created.
26. **CreatedById**: Reference to the user who created the case.
27. **LastModifiedDate**: Date and time of the last modification.
28. **LastModifiedById**: Reference to the user who last modified the case.
29. **SystemModstamp**: Timestamp for system modifications.
30. **ContactPhone**: Phone number of the contact.
31. **ContactMobile**: Mobile phone number of the contact.
32. **ContactEmail**: Email address of the contact.
33. **ContactFax**: Fax number of the contact.
34. **Comments**: Additional comments or notes.
35. **LastViewedDate**: Date and time when the case was last viewed.
36. **LastReferencedDate**: Date and time when the case was last referenced in a related record.
37. **EngineeringReqNumber__c**: Custom field for the engineering request number.
38. **SLAViolation__c**: Indicates if there was an SLA violation (picklist).
39. **Product__c**: Product associated with the case (picklist).
40. **PotentialLiability__c**: Potential liability associated with the case (picklist).

These attributes collectively enable comprehensive case management, facilitating efficient customer service and support operations.
label: Case
